snippet: Israel blamed Iran for the rocket attack on the Israeli-held part of the Golan Heights, a flare-up that appeared to be the most serious one in the area in months.
abstract: Israel launches retaliatory artillery and airstrikes against 14 Syrian army posts in Golan Heights after four rockets fired from Syrian territory land in Israeli-held areas of Golan Heights and in Israel's Upper Galilee; Israel blames Iran for flare-up.

byline.contributor: Hwaida Saad contributed reporting from Beirut.

lead_paragraph: Israel blamed Iran for the rocket attack on the Israeli-held part of the Golan Heights, a flare-up that appeared to be the most serious one in the area in months.

headline.main: Responding to Rocket Fire, Israeli Forces Carry Out Strikes in Syria
headline.print_headline: Responding to Rocket Fire, Israeli Forces Carry Out Strikes in Syria
